title: Leo Tomé
text:
Leonardo di Mello Martins Tomé, known as Leo Tomé (born 17 September 1986) is a Brazilian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who plays for <a href="S.C.%20Farense">Farense</a>. He also holds <a href="Portugal">Portuguese</a> citizenship.
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Segunda%20Liga">Segunda Liga</a> for <a href="C.D.%20Mafra">Mafra</a> on 8 August 2015 in a game against <a href="Gil%20Vicente%20F.C.">Gil Vicente</a>.
